profile:
Save thousands by dealing directly with a manufacturer! Canadian Choice Windows and Doors Inc. is a leading manufacturer of windows in Canada, serving Ontario. Canadian Choice Windows and Doors offers a huge selection of replacement windows including energy efficient windows, vinyl windows, casement windows, awning windows and bow and bay windows.

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors has been serving Toronto, Richmond Hill, North York, Markham, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Kitchener, Cambridge, Niagra Falls and the surrounding areas as well as in Calgary, Edmonton, Winnipeg and Northern Ontario. 

Why is Canadian Choice Windows and Doors your best solution for window replacement?

1. No Pressure Estimate: take your time & make informed decision

2. Save Money: Energy Star windows will reduce your energy bill by 30 %

3. Professional Installation: flawless installation and thorough clean up by courteous installers

4. High Quality: The highest quality windows in the industry, featuring foam injected honey comb structure.
 
5. Easy Financing: Financing solutions to fit anyoneâ€™s lifestyle

6. Maximum Comfort: low-E coating to reflect summer sun and retain winter heat with our Cardinal Smart Glass system.

7. Zero Maintenance: our windows are easy to clean from within the home and will never fade or discolor

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors is your smartest solution for window and door replacement.

profile:
Great Canadian is a fully integrated residential and commercial renovation company dedicated to providing sustainable energy solutions for your home or commercial property.

Experienced, professional and trusted, Great Canadian will provide you with the right advice, quality workmanship, excellent service and the best brands of products no matter what your need. All services are competitively priced for your project and include roofing, attic insulation, siding, windows and doors, soffits and fascia, eavestroughs and any related insurance needs. Great Canadian combines skill and technology to provide you the best service possible.

profile:
With 40+ years in the industry, we are experts at what we do. What began as a small family run business has expanded into fully integrated interior and exterior construction company, servicing all Western Canada.

At SPAAR, we simplify the building and renovation process by providing a full-service approach. By owning the building envelope, we schedule, manage and complete projects for our clients in a quick and effective timeframe.

Our extensive list of services provides a seamless process from insulation, drywall, interior painting & roofing, allowing our clients to sit back and relax while we complete the project. With over 1400+ projects a year, our expertise and proven process allows for high quality work and on-time execution.

We specialize in the following services:

SPAAR Colours - Interior/Exterior Painting, Cabinet Refinishing, Trim & Doors, stucco refinishing, siding painting
SPAAR Exteriors - Residential Roofing (Asphalt shingles, Cedar Shakes, Metal Roofing), fascia, soffits and eavestroughs
SPAAR Spray Systems - Attic insulation, Attic inspections, Interior & Exterior Spray Foam applications
services:
SPAAR Colours - Interior/Exterior Painting, Cabinet Refinishing, Trim & Doors, stucco repainting/repair, siding painting, deck and fence staining/painting
SPAAR Exteriors - Residential Roofing (Asphalt shingles, Cedar Shakes, Metal Roofing) Installation of attic vents, eavestrough, soffits, fascia
SPAAR Spray Systems - Attic insulation, Interior & Exterior Spray Foam applications
specialities:
Spray Foam Insulation
Drywall & Taping
Painting
Roofing
